unnormalised: Social media is practically overflowing with brand collaborations, and honestly, who isn't seeing #collab posts daily? It's the new way brands are trying to reach you, and influencers are raking in the Rs.
normalised: Social media is practically overflowing with brand collaborations, and honestly, who isn't seeing hash collab posts daily? It's the new way brands are trying to reach you, and influencers are raking in the rupees.

unnormalised: This week, we've got Mira Kapoor promoting a fancy kitchen appliance brand, and Ranveer Allahbadia’s podcast is sponsored by a meditation app. Talk about a diverse range! Even smaller brands are getting in on the action. Local Lucknow chikankari artisans are teaming up with Instagram fashionistas, showcasing their beautiful work to a wider audience.
normalised: This week, we've got Mira Kapoor promoting a fancy kitchen appliance brand, and Ranveer Allahbadia’s podcast is sponsored by a meditation app. Talk about a diverse range! Even smaller brands are getting in on the action. Local Lucknow chikankari artisans are teaming up with Instagram fashionistas, showcasing their beautiful work to a wider audience.

unnormalised: But are these collabs actually *working*? Some are total hits, others… not so much. We saw one influencer trying to promote a biryani mix during Onam. Major cultural faux pas!
normalised: But are these collaborations actually *working*? Some are total hits, others… not so much. We saw one influencer trying to promote a biryani mix during Onam. Major cultural faux pas!

unnormalised: Experts say authenticity is key. People can sniff out a forced collaboration from a km away. Brands need to choose influencers who genuinely vibe with their product and audience.
normalised: Experts say authenticity is key. People can sniff out a forced collaboration from a kilometer away. Brands need to choose influencers who genuinely vibe with their product and audience.

unnormalised: So, what’s next? We predict even more creative collaborations are on the horizon. Think educational institutions partnering with meme pages for awareness campaigns – mind blown! Keep your eyes peeled (and wallets ready!).
normalised: So, what’s next? We predict even more creative collaborations are on the horizon. Think educational institutions partnering with meme pages for awareness campaigns – mind blown! Keep your eyes peeled (and wallets ready!).
